description: Nach Angaben von Bergsteigern ist der Hillary Step am Gipfel des Mount Everest abgebrochen. Das könnte künftige Aufstiege gefährlich machen, warnen Kenner des Berges.
title: Hillary Step: Mount Everest verliert markanten Felsabsatz

description: Kathmandu (Nepal) – Todes-Drama am Mount Everest. Unterhalb des Gipfels auf 7950 Metern Höhe haben Retter Dienstagnacht die Leichen von vier unbekannten Bergsteigern entdeckt.Die Toten wurden durch
title: Todesdrama am Mount Everest - Vier Bergsteiger tot in ihrem Zelt gefunden

author: Spiegel Online
description: Auf dem Mount Everest sind erneut Bergsteiger ums Leben gekommen. Retter fanden die Leichen durch Zufall in einem Zelt - und fragen sich: Wer sind die Toten?
title: Höchster Berg der Welt: Retter entdecken vier Tote am Mount Everest

description: A 27-year-old Indian climber, who went missing on Mount Everest, has died after he fell some 200 metres on his return after conquering the world's tallest peak, the fifth fatality on the mountain this season, an official said on Monday
title: Indian climber who went missing after conquering Mount Everest found dead - Times of India

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/james-bennett/5693616
description: The number of climbers who have died on Mount Everest this spring season now stands at six, but observers say that figure is normal.
title: No evidence Mt Everest any more dangerous, mountaineers say

author: Gopal Sharma
description: An American climber on Mount Everest died on Sunday, officials said, the third death on the world's highest mountain in the past month and raising safety concerns for climbers.
title: American climber dies on Everest, Indian missing

author: Abdul Gani
description: Anshu Jamsenpa of Bomdilla in Arunachal Pradesh became on Sunday the first woman to claim “dual ascent” of Mount Everest twice within a span of five days. She broke the previous record of Nepal’s Chhurim Sherpa, who had climbed Mt Everest twice in a week in 2012.
title: Mother of two from Arunachal becomes world's first woman to scale Everest twice in week - Times of India

author: BINAJ GURUBACHARYA
description: KATHMANDU, Nepal (AP) — An American climber has died near the summit of Mount Everest and an Indian climber is missing after heading down from the mountain following a successful ascent, expedition organizers said Sunday. Roland Yearwood, 50, from Georgiana, Alabama, died on the mountain on Sunday but other details were not immediately known, said Murari Sharma of the Everest Parivar Expedition agency, based in Kathmandu, Nepal's capital. Indian climber Ravi Kamar fell sick on his way down from the summit on Saturday and did not make it to the nearest camp, while his accompanying Nepalese Sherpa guide made it to a camp, said Thupden Sherpa of Arun Treks and Expedition.
title: American climber dies, Indian missing on Everest

author: Chloe Farand
description: A British mountaineer has confirmed a cliff face that is the last major obstacle on the main route to the summit of Mount Everest has collapsed, potentially making it even more dangerous for climbers to reach the world’s highest peak.  The Hillary Step, named after Sir Edmund Hillary, who made the first ascent with Tenzing Norgay in 1953, is believed to have collapsed during the devastating earthquakes that hit Nepal in 2015.
title: The last major obstacle on the way to the summit of Everest has collapsed
